wikipedia_page.main: William Walter White (born 26 July 1907, date of death unknown) was a Scottish professional footballer.  His clubs included Bristol Rovers, Aldershot, Carlisle United, Bristol City and Gillingham.  He made a total of 268 appearances in the Football League.
